tag_list: santosh-kalwar, nokia, self-published-writer, author, six-books, poetry, information-technology, lappeenrata, nepal, chitwan, trainee, researcher
overview:
Santosh Kalwar was born in 1982 in Nepal and was accepted to the international Master’s program on Information Technology at the Lappeenranta University of Technology in fall 2007. He holds an M.Sc and B.E. degree in Information Technology and Computer Science and Engineering from Lappeenranta University of Technology, Lappeenranta, Finland and Visvesvaraya Technical University in Bangalore, India respectively.

Mr. Kalwar has worked in Nokia Research Center, Helsinki as a trainee. Santosh Kalwar is currently working as post-graduate student at the department of Information technology in Lappeenranta University of Technology, Lappeenranta, Finland.

Santosh Kalwar is the author of Six published books entitle Nature God (2008), Human behavior on the Internet(2009), A Very First book of Poems:Heartbreak (2009),…109 Quotes, 07 Poems and a Song of Despair…(2009), 20 Love Poems and The Economy Crisis (2009) and 25 Sexy Poems (2009). He has written several Newspaper articles on truth, love and relationships.
